metadata.title: CVE-2015-7312 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple race conditions in the Advanced Union Filesystem (aufs)aufs3-mmap.patch and aufs4-mmap.patch patches for the Linux kernel 3.x and4.x allow local users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and BUG)or possibly gain privileges via a (1) madvise or (2) msync system call,related to mm/madvise.c and mm/msync.c.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
